May 17 4
Col Jno M. Brown
45th Ky Inf
Lexington Ky
Col,
I have per direction of the Governor, to enclose herein, copy of extract of Inspectors Report of Dist of Ky for March 1864 -- Your attention is called to that portion relative to your Command.

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Gen of Ky
